concept.definition: The observation is very sensitive for the condition, but may also indicate other conditions.
The observation is very specific for this condition, but not particularly sensitive.

description: Kind of precondition for the condition.
name: ConditionPreconditionType

text.div:
ConditionPreconditionType

Kind of precondition for the condition.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-precondition-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
sensitive SensitiveThe observation is very sensitive for the condition, but may also indicate other conditions.
specific SpecificThe observation is very specific for this condition, but not particularly sensitive.

title: ConditionPreconditionType
